channel.title: Packs on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Packs on ZooBerry

item.title: Animal Flowerpost Pack
item.description: A pack featuring animal-themed flowerposts.

item.title: Animal Print Fences
item.description: A pack of six animal print fences for your zoo.

item.title: Aquatic Adventure Pack
item.description: Aquatic Adventure Pack featuring paths, gazebos, restaurants, and more.

item.title: Chinese Character Path Pack
item.description: A set of two paths with Chinese characters for your zoo.

item.title: Christmas Scenery Pack
item.description: Christmas Scenery Pack featuring fountains, gazebos, and more.

item.title: Crazy Fence Pack
item.description: A pack of crazy-themed fences to match the Crazy Paths pack.

item.title: Doooot's Animal Print Path Pack
item.description: A pack of 33 animal print paths for ZT2.

item.title: Doooot's Danish Paths Pack
item.description: A Danish-themed path pack.

item.title: Doooot's Mini Animal Fence Pack
item.description: A mini pack of animal-themed fences.

item.title: Doooot's Mixed Paths Pack
item.description: A mixed pack of 18 paths for ZT2.

item.title: Doooot's Mixed Paths Pack 2
item.description: A mixed pack of nine paths for ZT2.

item.title: Fire Column Pack
item.description: A decorative pack featuring fire-themed columns.

item.title: Flowerbed Pack
item.description: A collection of colorful flowerbeds for your zoo.

item.title: Foliage Pack
item.description: A foliage pack featuring trees, shrubs, and flowers.

item.title: Halloween Pack 1 - Superheroes
item.description: Reskins of animals featuring superhero themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 2 - Classics
item.description: Reskins of animals featuring classic Halloween themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 3 - Fun
item.description: Reskins of animals with fun and creative themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 4 - Girly
item.description: Reskins of animals with girly and fantastical themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 5 - Mickey and Minnie
item.description: Reskins of animals featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse.

item.title: Halloween Scenery Pack
item.description: Halloween Scenery Pack with paths, canopies, and more.

item.title: Halloween Trees
item.description: Spooky trees to decorate your Halloween zoo.

item.title: Honor Halloween Path Pack
item.description: A set of four Halloween-themed paths for your zoos.

item.title: Japanese Mini Pack
item.description: A Japanese-themed pack with paths and objects for your zoo.

item.title: Nique's Foliage Pack
item.description: A vibrant foliage pack to brighten up your zoo.

item.title: Purple Pack
item.description: A purple-themed pack with various decorative objects.

item.title: RedNotDead Crazy Path Pack
item.description: A pack of 10 colorful and crazy paths.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Contest Pack 1
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 1 with Easter-themed objects.

item.title: Snow Tiger Easter Pack 2
item.description: Snow Tigers Easter Contest Pack 2 with Easter-themed objects and animals.

item.title: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack
item.description: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack with paths, fences, and more.

item.title: Valentine Pack
item.description: A Valentine-themed pack featuring paths, balloons, a gazebo, animals, and more.

item.title: YR ZT 2 Path Pack 1
item.description: A pack of nine paths to beautify your zoos.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon Fansites Blimps
item.description: A pack of 12 blimps based on Zoo Tycoon fansite designs.

item.title: T'ni's Halloween Path Pack
item.description: A spooky Halloween-themed path collection created by T’ni.

item.title: Valentine Variant Pack
item.description: An albino lion variant released for Valentine’s Day.

item.title: Albino Animal Variant Pack
item.description: Three great albino animal variants for your zoo.

item.title: Expansive Packs
item.description: These mods feel like unofficial expansion packs and mini DLC with mods from mixed categories.

item.title: Jungle Escape
item.description: Add an UXP containing several birds from different tropical regions. Objects fit perfectly with the default jungle theme.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Shark Pack Total Remake
item.description: Shark Pack Total Remake is an expansive pack for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by zerosvalmont.

item.title: Prehistoric Sharks and Biome Mini-Pack
item.description: A pack with two animals and a new biome.

item.title: Bog Pack
item.description: A Bog Pack made by Hendrix with new animals, objects, and a new biome.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 2
item.description: This is the second part of the Zoo Tycoon 2 Operation Genesis project.

item.title: Alpine Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Boreal Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Savannah Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Scrub Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Temperate Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Tundra Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Genkicoll's ZT1 Paths for ZT2 Pack
item.description: A selection of genkicoll’s wonderful paths that she has made for ZT1, replicated with permission for use in ZT2. Enjoy wooden, sandstone, shadowstone and other paths in your zoos!

item.title: Red River Hog Pack
item.description: Red river hogs are social animals. While adults of both sexes have been known to be solitary, most live in small groups of up to eleven individuals.

item.title: Japanese Macaque Pack
item.description: Japanese macaques range through the forested mountains and highlands of Japan.

item.title: Vicuña Pack
item.description: Vicuñas are found in semiarid rolling grasslands and plains at altitudes of 3,500-5,750 meters.

item.title: American Alligator Pack
item.description: American alligators are usually found in freshwater swamps, marshes, rivers, lakes, and occasionally smaller bodies of water.

item.title: Ganges River Dolphin Pack
item.description: The Ganges river dolphin lives in the muddy waters of the Ganges, Brahmaputra, Meghna, Karnaphuli, and Hoogly river systems.

item.title: Dorcas Gazelle and Adonis Dentata
item.description: The dorcas gazelle is highly adapted to the desert. They can go their entire lives without drinking.

item.title: Painted Reed Frog Pack
item.description: A pack containing a wetlands mushroom, a painted reed frog and an information board.

item.title: Fire Pack
item.description: From the hidden island of Drom emerges mythical beasts of fire.

item.title: Amur Leopard Mini Pack
item.description: The Amur leopard is one of nine recognised subspecies of leopard.

item.title: Eurasian Wolf Mini Pack
item.description: The Eurasian wolf, also known as the European, common or forest wolf, is a subspecies of grey wolf which has the largest range among wolf subspecies.

item.title: The Christmas Pack 2: 7 Reasons to Celebrate
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack - 7 Reasons to Celebrate is the sequel to the collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: Charming Cretaceous
item.description: A pack containing 15 Cretaceous era, JPOG styled dinosaurs.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 1
item.description: A pack containing various buildings, scenery and foliage imported from JPOG.

item.title: AVES
item.description: An expansive user-made expansion pack made by the ZT ABC Team!

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: REPTILIA
item.description: Reptilia is a new expansion pack made by ZT ABC!

item.title: Shen's Path Pack
item.description: A pack with 12 new paths!

item.title: Sandstone Theme
item.description: The Sandstone Theme Pack contains items made of softly coloured sandstone, often overgrown with ivy.

item.title: Mediterranean Pack
item.description: The Mediterranean Pack contains Four animals and Four Plant from the Mediterranean Region, both Aquatic and Terrestrial.

item.title: Europe Pack
item.description: A Pack containing four European animals and Plants.

item.title: Coastal Theme Pack
item.description: A coastal theme pack by ShenTirag.

item.title: Arabia Pack
item.description: A Pack containing four Arabian animals and Plants.

item.title: Colored Path Pack
item.description: This pack contains 14 wonderful colors of path to add a delightful touch to your zoo.
